channel.title: Library on The Sovereign Library
channel.description: Recent content in Library on The Sovereign Library

item.title: Library
item.description:
The Library holds the operational knowledge of the sovereign system.

Core Sections

  • Patterns — Behavioral and structural patterns observed in the field
  • Protocols — Operational procedures and systematic approaches
  • Philosophy — Foundational principles and conceptual frameworks
  • Field Tests — Real-world applications and validation logs

System Infrastructure

  • History — Timeline, events, and system evolution
  • Relationships — Social architecture and connections
  • System — Metadata, analysis, and technical infrastructure
  • Council — AI Council rules and engagement protocols

item.title: v8: Three-Layer Architecture
item.description:
Summary: v8 separates the system into three distinct layers so the system stays usable: the Library holds, the Mirror operates, the Third Layer is lived.

The Library (this site)

Holds everything you know: principles, patterns, protocols, history. It does not try to run your day. It holds weight outside your head.

The Mirror

The operational layer: what’s active now, what matters now, what is true now. Lean, current, portable. This is what gets pasted into sessions. It’s intentionally small.
